column4: a Facebook account named “Born Sambo”  reported on the latest situation of a police officer who was seriously injured in a gas ------explosion in Siem Reap------. The officer
column6: is still in a critical condition.------After seeing the courage and dedication of the police officer
column7: Facebook users expressed their admiration for the police officer’s sense of responsibility. Some have described this as a police officer’s role in the rescue of  people from the flames. ------SOURCE
